column5: hey does anyone know the condition of port albert now or goderich for that matter....around there steelhead and salmon go around the same time... has anyone went yet?
I would try http://www.greybruceoutdoors.com.  You may have more success from this board.

You already missed the run man, they like the low, warm and clear summer waters!  Nahh just messin man, take a drive up there and fish, if they are there catch them and don' tell anyone. Less fishing pressure .  (sound familiar?)
